ingredients: 1 1/4 lb. Yukon Gold or other waxy yellow &nbsp potatoes, unpeeled, cut into 1/2-inch &nbsp dice
1 1/4 lb. Yukon Gold or other waxy yellow &nbsp potatoes, unpeeled, cut into 1/2-inch &nbsp dice
1 large mild yellow onion, cut into 1/2-inch dice
1 green or red bell pepper, seeded, deribbed &nbsp and cut into 1/2-inch squares
1 1/2 lb. unsliced cooked lean corned beef, cut &nbsp into 1/2-inch dice
1/2 cup finely chopped fresh flat-leaf parsley, &nbsp plus parsley sprigs for garnish
Salt and freshly ground pepper, to taste
